node.text: ⚠️AMAZING KITTEN RESCUE!⚠️ During our recent trip to Greece, our friends @everchanginghorizon and @jess.wandering rescued the cutest little kitten that was abandoned on a cliffside and we were honored to also help after getting introduced to @zawf.zante.gr an incredible animal rescue charity that desperately needed more funding to help save more animals! Karmagawa cofounder @timothysykes donated 1,000 euros to them on the spot, but we have also created a fundraiser with the goal of raising $25,000 to get them a full on shelter and veterinarian on their staff because there are SO many more animals in Zakynthos that need URGENT help so please donate what you can, share this video with your followers and tag people, celebrities and influencers who need to see and share this too and let’s all work together to raise the $25k ZAWF needs to help more animals in need! Sadly, this little kitten didn’t make it and that’s why we MUST get these poor animals more help faster in the future…we’ll link our @karmagawa Facebook fundraiser in our stories/highlights too and ALL donations on all platforms, great and small, are most appreciated! #helpanimals #savethekitties #zakynthos #animalrescue #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️HOW GREAT IS THIS ANIMAL RESCUE?!⚠️ Leo found this squirrel having a seizure while he was helping his mom in the garden and he quickly decided to help this poor creature in need. Even though the squirrel was unresponsive at first, Leo still wanted to help and as you watch this video, see how he and his sister successfully nursed this poor squirrel back to full health! How great is this?! Please share this heartwarming video with your followers and tag people who need some positivity in their day and let’s all thank Leo and his sister for their amazing animal rescue here as we should all get inspired to help animals in need! Great video @ladbible #saveanimals #animalrescue #helpanimals #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️GRAPHIC IMAGES: PLEASE SHARE THIS AND SIGN THE PETITION TO STOP THIS ANIMAL ABUSE RIGHT NOW! ⚠️ Do you know the dark truth behind the cosmetic industry and the beauty products far too many unaware people use? How beautiful can someone feel if they knew that their beauty products caused unimaginable pain and torture to innocent animals?⁣⁠ The testing of baby pigs, beagles, rabbits, monkeys, rats and mice reveals deliberate cruelty…rabbits dying, monkeys screaming and dogs suffering accompanied by staff jokes as they are injected or forced to ingest or inhale substances to measure toxic effects, which can include vomiting, internal bleeding, respiratory problems, fever, organ failure and even death.⁠ This happens worldwide and spreading awareness is the key to stopping it so please share this sad post with your followers and tag people who need to see this. There’s also a petition in the @karmagawa highlights to close Vivotecnia Laboratory, one of the worst offenders...THIS MUST STOP NOW! Please share this video with your followers and tag people, celebrities and influencers who need to see this too and sign the petition we’ve linked in our highlights as sadly more than 115 million animals suffer and die every year in laboratories like these — WE MUST WORK TOGETHER TO STOP THIS ANIMAL ABUSE RIGHT NOW!  Use your social media platform and share to speak up for these innocent animals that are being tortured! Eye-opening video by @thesavemovement  #endanimalcruelty #stopanimalcruelty #endanimaltesting #stopanimaltesting #animalsdeservebetter #karmagawa

node.title: The Dark Truth Behind The Cosmetic Industry

node.text: ⚠️PLEASE SHARE THIS AMAZING VIDEO AND LET’S REMIND EVERYONE TO HELP ANIMALS IN NEED! ⚠️ This rescued baby chimp fell asleep in the lap of the pilot @anthonycaere while they flew to his new home…how cute is this?! Amazing work Anthony and @lwiro_primates stop, ok ease help us get the word out about this incredible story and these people who work hard to protect these beautiful animals by sharing this post and tagging people who need to see it as we MUST make this a better planet for humans and animals alike and spreading awareness is the key! Great video by @thedodo #animalrescue #savethebabies #animalsdeservebetter #stopthekilling #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️GRAPHIC WARNING: PLEASE SHARE TO HELP STOP THIS REVOLTING ANIMAL CRUELTY! ⚠️ This is who really suffers for the exotic skins trade. This footage exposes how workers are trained to kill and skin crocodiles—all for “fashion” and WE MUST EACH DO OUR PART TO STOP THIS MADNESS RIGHT NOW! The fact that people still buy clothing and accessories made from animal skin like this is due to a lack of awareness of how terribly these animals are treated so please use your social media platform and share this URGENT video with your followers to help us educate everyone as WE MUST STOP THIS ANIMAL ABUSE ONCE AND FOR ALL! There’s plenty of other non-cruel materials that can be used to make clothing and accessories, especially sustainable/recycled fabrics like our own Karmagawa & @savethereef charity march (see link in our bio)…WE MUST GET THE FASHION INDUSTRY TO STOP ABUSING/ELECTROCUTING INNOCENT ANIMALS! Please share this sad video and tag people, celebrities, influencers & news media who need to see and share this too…no animal deserves to to be treated like this! Thanks for posting @peta #savethecrocodiles #endanimalcruelty #stopanimalcruelty #karmagawa

node.title: Why You Shouldn’t Buy Crocodile Skin Clothing/Accessories

node.text: ⚠️HOW AMAZING IS THIS ACT OF HUMAN KINDNESS?⚠️This cow had fallen down a slope and into the fast-moving water and would have drowned had it not been saved by several brave locals here. Please watch and share this incredible animal rescue video with your followers and tag people, celebrities, influencers and news media who need to see it so they can share too & let’s all spread awareness about this important message of how we should ALL help animals in need like these kind people did for this cow that was nearly swept away by this canal! #teamwork #animalrescue #helpanimals #saveanimals #karmagawa

node.text: How heart-warming is the rescue of this 3-legged stray cat that spent nearly a decade outside in the cold? No wonder Bubby just wants to curl up by the fireplace now! Please watch/share this beautiful video with your followers and tag people, celebrities, influencers who need to see it so they can share too because ALL ANIMALS DESERVE ALL THE HELP AND LOVE WE CAN GIVE THEM, PLEASE USE YOUR SOCIAL MEDIA PLATFORM TO HELP US SPREAD THIS IMPORTANT MESSAGE! Video by @thedodo @somebubbytolove #helpanimals #straycat #animalrescue #saveanimals #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️GRAPHIC IMAGES, PLEASE SHARE THIS WITH YOUR FOLLOWERS!⚠️12 years ago, the abuse of sloth bears was being sold to tourists as ‘entertainment’ in the streets of India. These ‘dancing bears’ were in constant agony as they pleased their ‘owners’ for the enjoyment of passers-by. With a rope threaded through a raw wound of their muzzle, they were pulled around to stand on their hind legs and shake in pain, giving the illusion of a ‘dance’. The bear in this video is named Raju, India's very last dancing bear. Thanks to @international_animal_rescue @wildlifesos and @freethebears more than 600 bears, including Raju were rescued and given a permanent home at one of the sanctuaries throughout India! The direct action of rescuing these bears was of course necessary in ending this 400+ year old tradition, but working with the bear handlers (known as the Kalandar people) with education and outreach programs was also vital as the Kalandar people who relied on the practice to feed their families were treated with dignity and were provided with alternate livelihoods through training schemes and grants. Many have now gone on to open their own businesses while others now work at the rescue centers. And for the first time Kalandar children were able to attend school and receive education sponsored by the project, in fact over 1000 children have now benefitted from this program. Please share this sad but ultimately uplifting post with your followers and tag people, celebrities and influencers as together, we can all make a difference to the lives of suffering animals everywhere! Great video by @international_animal_rescue #animalrescue #savethebears #endanimalcruelty #stopanimalcruelty #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️WARNING: GRAPHIC IMAGES, PLEASE SHARE TO HELP SAVE SHARKS!⚠️ Back in 2019, the Karmagawa crew traveled to South Africa with the extremely talented underwater photographers @andremusgrove and @jeff_panella and our partners at @representclo to bring greater awareness to the sharks of South Africa since these apex predators are being killed far too often and that’s de-stabilizing our planet’s marine ecosystem. For this @savethereef project we worked with the great charity @sharkconservancy and the awesome crew at @shark_explorers and we are proud to also support marine life charities like @sharkguardian in their important shark research and conservation efforts. Please watch and share this urgent video with your followers and tag people, celebrities, influencers and news media who need to see it so we can make EVERYONE aware of how urgent this crisis has become as we MUST stop killing sharks and destroying the future of our oceans before it’s too late! #SouthAfrica #savethesharks #sharksarefriends #savethereef #karmagawa

node.title: Why We MUST Save Sharks Before It’s Too Late!

node.text: ⚠️SHARE THIS WITH SOMEONE SPECIAL IN YOUR LIFE!⚠️This is for anyone who needs a little reminder of how incredible animals are and the power of love/togetherness on this special day, Happy Valentine’s Day everyone! Share with your followers and tag someone who needs to see it too, great video by @thedodo #animallover #loveislove #valentines #happyvalentinesday #animallovers #karmagawa

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Karmagawa on August 23, 2021. May be an image of 1 person and outdoors.

node.text: ⚠️SAD BREAKING NEWS: PLEASE SHARE AND DONATE TO OUR FUNDRAISER TO HELP THE AFGHAN PEOPLE!⚠️ Soldiers from several countries have stepped in to take care of the babies/children of families hoping to escape Afghanistan before the August 31st deadline for the withdrawal of international troops from the troubled country. Sadly, now its being reported that at least 20 people have died in the past week in and around the Kabul airport during the chaotic evacuation effort after the Taliban took over the Afghan capital last week and more deaths are expected in the coming days so we must ALL work together to save as many people as possible before it’s to late. Please keep sharing our posts about this crisis with your followers and tagging people, celebrities and influencers who need to see and also share this to get more international help and please keep donating to our fundraiser as we’re very proud that between the @karmagawa and @savethereef communities, we’ve now raised $130,000+ in the past week alone, 100% of which will be donated to charities like @partnersrelief and @savethechildren which are both now in the planning stages on how to help as many families as possible in Afghanistan! While we recognize this is a small dollar amount for such a big problem, we hope to raise much more in the coming days as EVERY donation great and small will go towards providing food, water, medical treatment and shelter for the Afghan people and EVERY LIFE MATTERS so please keep praying, donating and sharing and we’ll update our rescue efforts along the way as these children and families need all our support RIGHT NOW! #helpafghanistan #saveafghanistan #savethechildern #kabulafghanistan #childrendeservebetter #prayforafghanistan #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️GRAPHIC IMAGES/SAD BREAKING NEWS: PLEASE SHARE/DONATE TO OUR FUNDRAISER TO HELP AFGHANISTAN!⚠️ The chaos in Kabul continues as several innocent Afghans were just crushed to death and severely injured at the front of the line while trying to get on flights at the airport as thousands of locals are rushing to leave in the next few days when countries like the UK and the US are expected to pull out. The situation has escalated so much the US embassy told Americans to stay away from the airport, warning of potential security threats outside the gates. This chaos come as reports say the Taliban is now going door-to-door, searching for people who worked for NATO forces or the previous Afghan government, to find targets by threatening their family members. Taliban fighters hunting a DW journalist have shot dead one member of his family and seriously injured another even what the journalist now works in Germany. The Taliban has tried to reassure the world there would be "no revenge”, but there are growing fears of a gap between what they say and what they do. WE MUST HELP THESE PEOPLE RIGHT NOW! Please donate to and share our new Karmagawa fundraiser where 100% of the funds will be donated to @partnersrelief @savethechildren and other charities on the ground in this area to help the locals escape this brutality and share this post with your followers and tag people, celebrities and influencers who need to see/share this too as WE MUST MAKE EVERYONE AWARE ABOUT THIS RIGHT NOW! Let’s all work together to help for the Afghan people! #prayforkabul #prayforafghanistan #helpkabul #afghantaliban #karmagawa

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Karmagawa on August 21, 2021. May be an image of 1 person, standing and outdoors.

Photo by Karmagawa on August 21, 2021. May be an image of 4 people, people standing, outdoors and text that says 'Relative of DW journalist killed by the Taliban Journalists and their families are in grave danger in Afghanistan. The Taliban have no compunction about carrying out targeted killings as the case ofa DW journalist shows. f The Taliban took Kabul much more quickly than Western forces expected Gul/AP/picture'.

Photo by Karmagawa on August 21, 2021. May be an image of motorcycle, outdoors and text that says 'Taliban carrying out door-to-door manhunt for Afghans on blacklist, report says In recent days the group's fighters responded with force to nascent protests in pockets across the country as their rule faced a number of early challenges. BREAKING NEWS TENS OF THOUSANDS OF AFGHANS DESPERATE τO FLEE TALIBAN NGUTY StNEWS'.

node.text: ⚠️GRAPHIC IMAGES/SAD BREAKING NEWS: PLEASE SHARE AND DONATE TO OUR NEW FUNDRAISER TO HELP THE AFGHAN PEOPLE!⚠️ The crisis at the Kabul airport in Afghanistan is getting worse as new videos show mothers resorting to passing their babies over barbed wire to soldiers in a vain attempt to get them out of the country. Westerners and visa holders trying to get to their flights say they are unable to get to the gates because of the crowd of up to 50,000 desperate locals who are gathering at the gates. While US and UK troops have said that firing warning shots is a last resort, the Taliban have been filmed today shooting from the hip just yards away from women and children, and whacking people with the butts of their rifles. Sadly, the chaos outside the airport appears to be growing by the day and is causing dangerous stampedes in which several people have already been killed this week, including a 14-year-old girl. WE MUST GET THESE PEOPLE MORE HELP! Please join us in praying for all the people and families now stuck in Afghanistan, donate to our new Karmagawa fundraiser where 100% of the funds will be donated to @partnersrelief @savethechildren and other charities on the ground in this area and share this post with your followers and tag people, celebrities and influencers who need to see/share this too as we must make EVERYONE aware of what’s happening here to get them help RIGHT NOW! The International community must not look away so please use your social platform for good and share this now to get help for the Afghan people! #prayforkabul #prayforafghanistan #helpkabul #afghantaliban #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️GRAPHIC IMAGES/SAD BREAKING NEWS: PLEASE SHARE AND DONATE TO OUR NEW FUNDRAISER TO HELP THE AFGHAN PEOPLE!⚠️ Tens of thousands of Afghans have gathered at the airport who have been promised sanctuary by western nations, but due to the Taliban blocking them from entering the airport, there have been several empty/nearly-empty planes taking off for countries like The Netherlands, Australia, France, Italy and Germany. One tragic video shows women pleading with US troops to let them into the airport because as they say, “the Taliban are coming for me”. Despite yesterday’s Taliban press conference promoting more moderate views, images of the Taliban cracking down on a protest with bloodied women and children beaten by fighters are already contradicting that message. 4 people were reportedly killed in the protest and 13 injured and video shows crowds running as gunfire was heard. There’s also reports of women and children being beaten/whipped as they attempt to pass through checkpoints set up by the militants despite assurances of “safe passage”. Is it any wonder why so many Afghans are so desperate to escape? Sadly, this might quickly become a large humanitarian disaster so we at Karmagawa have setup a fundraiser to help the Afghan people and we will be donating 100% of the funds raised to our charity partners @partnersrelief @savethechildren and several more charities we’re talking with to help provide fleeing/displaced Afghans with food, water, medical treatment and temporary shelter in their time of need. Please use your social platform for good and share this post/our fundraiser with your followers and tag people, celebrities and influencers who need to see/share it too, EVERY share and EVERY donation great and small matters right now as we MUST work together to help the Afghan people RIGHT NOW! #helpafghanistan #saveafghanistan #karmagawa

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Karmagawa on August 17, 2021. May be an image of 2 people, people sitting and text that says 'Photo: Getty Images MIDDLE EAST MATTERS Taliban are going door-to-door forcibly 'marrying' girls as young as 12 years old into sex slavery Swipe >>>'.

node.text: ⚠️PLEASE SHARE AND DONATE TO OUR NEW FUNDRAISER TO HELP AFGHANISTAN RIGHT NOW!⚠️ We’ve launched a new Karmagawa fundraiser to help those fleeing the cruel Taliban in Afghanistan and this post should make everyone understand better why people are so desperate to escape RIGHT NOW! Please swipe over and look closely at every picture and video and share this post with your followers and tag people, celebrities and news media who need to see and share it too, and also donate if you can as we MUST work together to help the Afghan people in their darkest hour. EVERY share and EVERY donation great and small matters right now as it’s just been one day since the Taliban took control and already there are already stories coming out about their cruelty towards women in particular. In northern Afghanistan, The Taliban demanded a mother of four in a small village cook food for up to 15 fighters. "My mother told them, 'I am poor, how can I cook for you?'" her daughter said. "The Taliban started beating her. My mother collapsed and they hit her with their guns — AK47s." The woman died from the beating.⁠ The Taliban denied the killing, but their words are contradicted by witnesses and local officials who confirmed the death of a 45-year-old women whose home was also burned. This is just one of many stories because to Afghanistan's women, the Taliban represents the sudden and devastating loss of rights gained over 20 years, the right to work, study, move and even live in peace, that they fear will never be regained. WE MUST HELP THE AFGHAN PEOPLE RIGHT NOW and that’s why we’ve started this new fundraiser and have already begun planning with several charities on the ground there so 100% of the money we raise will be donated to helping Afghans escape from such cruelty…use your social platform for good and please share this and donate too! Info from @middleeastmatters @cnn @theafghan #helpafghanistan #afghanistan #saveafghanistan #karmagawa

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Karmagawa on August 17, 2021. May be an image of 2 people, people sitting and text that says 'Photo: Getty Images MIDDLE EAST MATTERS Taliban are going door-to-door forcibly 'marrying' girls as young as 12 years old into sex slavery Swipe >>>'.

Photo by Karmagawa on August 17, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'MIDDLE EAST MATTERS A lifetime of rape & sexual servitude awaits unmarried girls in Afghanistan following the Taliban's control over the region. Jihadist commanders have forced the imams in the areas they have seized to bring them a list of unmarried girls for their soldiers to marry. "They view them as qhanimat or 'spoils of war' to be divided up among the victors," Daily Mail reports. The fighters have been going door-to-door to 'claim their prizes'-young girls that will be subjected to a lifetime of sexual servitude. Sources: WSJ, The National, Dailymail'.
Photo by Karmagawa on August 17, 2021. May be an image of text.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Karmagawa on August 17, 2021. May be an image of 1 person and text that says 'Nearly 400.000 were forced from their homes since the beginning of the year, joining 2.9 million Afghans already internally displaced across the country at the end of 2020. 80 percent of internally displaced are women and children. June alone, 109,000 people were internally displaced within the country. Thousands of people are rushing from rural areas to the capital Kabul and other urban centers in search of shelter. .Around 15,000 internally displaced persons have arrived in Kabul from other provinces. Most of them are sleeping in the open, in parks and public spaces.'.

Photo by Karmagawa on August 17, 2021. May be an image of one or more people, people sitting and text that says 'The Taliban knocked on her door 3 times. The fourth time, they killed her VRMUNIYUR CNN'.
Photo by Karmagawa on August 17, 2021. May be an image of one or more people, people standing and road.

node.text: ⚠️GRAPHIC WARNING/SAD BREAKING NEWS, PLEASE SHARE AND LET’S PRAY FOR AN GET HELP HERE!⚠️ There’s chaos at Hamid Karzai International Airport in Kabul as Afghans try to flee the Taliban who just took control of Afghanistan, pouring into the capital, Kabul, and meeting little resistance. President Ashraf Ghani fled the country as the Taliban took over the presidential palace and the government collapsed and now gunfire and fear has now gripped the city, with tens of thousands of people trying to escape and witnesses say at least 5 people have died so far following desperate scenes at Kabul airport. Tragic video shows heavy gunfire, people storming the gates and scaling the 10- to 20-foot concrete walls to get onto the airfield with some even trying to cling onto the planes as they took off, with several people falling midair. With all scheduled flights now suspended, many foreigners and Afghans are now stranded as the militants' return to rule brings an end to almost 20 years of a US-led coalition's presence in the country. Please join us in praying for all the people and families now stuck in Afghanistan and share this post with your followers and tag people, celebrities and influencers who need to see and share this too as we must make EVERYONE aware of what’s happening here to get them help RIGHT NOW! The International community must not look away so please use your social platform for good and share this now to get help for these people! #prayforkabul #prayforafghanistan #helpkabul #afghantaliban #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️GRAPHIC WARNING/SAD BREAKING NEWS, PLEASE SHARE AND DONATE TO OUR NEW FUNDRAISER TO HELP HAITI⚠️ At least 227 people have been killed with thousands more injured and missing after a 7.2 magnitude earthquake struck Haiti on Saturday, just days before Tropical Storm Grace is expected to make landfall. The major quake hit about 78 miles west of Haiti's capital Port-au-Prince, and was felt across the Caribbean with people fleeing their homes for fear that buildings might collapse. The 7.2 magnitude quake was stronger and closer to the surface than the magnitude 7.1 quake that damaged much of the capital in 2010 and killed an estimated 200,000 people. Scientists are estimating "high casualties" and widespread disaster so Prime Minister Ariel Henry declared a state of emergency for 1 month, but also said he would not ask for international help until the extent of the damages is known. We at Karmagawa want to help AS MANY PEOPLE AS POSSIBLE RIGHT AWAY so we just started a new fundraiser to send aid to this hard hit country RIGHT NOW as we’re already in contact with several charities on the ground there. Haiti desperately needs our help right now so please use your social platform to help Haiti and share this post with your followers, celebrities, influencers and news media, join us in praying for more survivors and donate whatever you can to our new fundraiser as we’ll be providing food, clean water and emergency relief kits to all those in need in the coming hours and days! #helphaiti #earthquake #prayforhaiti #helpthoseinneed #karmagawa

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Karmagawa on August 14, 2021. May be an image of outdoors and text that says 'Pr For ray ray Haiti'.

node.text: ⚠️SAD BREAKING NEWS, WE’VE ADDED ALGERIA TO OUR LIST OF COUNTRIES TO DONATE TO! ⚠️ The worst wildfires in decades have killed at least 69 people, 41 civilians and 28 soldiers, in Algeria, making it the latest Mediterranean country to be struck by devastating blazes as temperatures have risen to unprecedented highs. There’s nearly 100 wildfires still burning and forcing people to evacuate and lose everything due to lack of proper firefighting equipment (so much so the locals have been trying to put out the flames using branches) and meteorologists expect the heat wave to continue for several more days, with temperatures in Algeria reaching 46 degrees Celsius (115 degrees Fahrenheit) so this country needs all the help they can get and that’s why we’ve added Algeria to our current fundraiser that also helps Greece and Turkey recover from their own devastating fires. You can also help by using your social media platform to spread awareness about this crisis and sharing this post with your followers and tagging people, celebrities, influencers and news media who need to see and share this too. And please donate to our new @karmagawa fundraiser where 100% of funds raised will go towards to fighting these fires and providing medical treatment, food, water and shelter for all the people and animals affected by these devastating fires so ALL donations, great and small, are most appreciated…let’s help these hard-hit countries RIGHT NOW! #helpgreece #helpalgeria #helpturkey #prayforgreece #wildfire #karmagawa

Photo by Karmagawa on August 10, 2021. May be an image of 1 person, standing and outdoors.

node.text: ⚠️SAD BREAKING NEWS, PLEASE SHARE AND HELP US SAVE AS MANY LIVES AS POSSIBLE HERE! ⚠️ Greece is facing a "natural disaster of unprecedented proportions," as 586 wildfires burn in "all corners" of the country, according to Greek Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis. This hard-hit country is experiencing one of its worst heat waves in decades and firefighters continue to battle blazes across the country with 63 separate evacuations just in the past few days. Greece's 2nd largest island, Evia, has been at the center of the storm of fires that have ravaged the country with over 50% of the island having burned. The weak response from the overwhelmed Greek government to this crisis has been widely criticized so now over 20 countries have sent firefighters and equipment to help, but Greece also needs our help right now! You can help by using your social media platform to spread awareness and sharing this post with your followers and tagging people, celebrities, influencers and news media who need to see and share this too. And if you can please donate to our new @karmagawa fundraiser where 100% of funds raised will go towards to fighting these fires and providing medical treatment, food, water and shelter for all the people and animals affected by these devastating fires…let’s help these hard-hit areas RIGHT NOW! #helpgreece #prayforgreece #wildfire #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️SAD BREAKING NEWS, PLEASE SHARE AND HELP US STOP THESE TOXIC FIRES!⚠️ The world’s biggest tire graveyard in Kuwait holds an estimated 20-40 million tires and sadly many of those tires are now on fire, as they have been in the past too. Tire fires are extremely difficult to put out and they create smoke that carries toxic chemicals, like carbon monoxide and sulfur oxides, resulting from the breakdown of rubber compounds. From respiratory ailments to cancer, these substances can have severe short- and long-term health effects and tires also release heavy metals and oil as they burn, which seep into the ground and water over time, polluting land and water. Given this tire graveyard’s proximate location to residential neighborhoods, the site poses a severe hazard to people’s health so last year, the Public Authority for Industry transferred the responsibility to the Environment Protection Agency (EPA), who were tasked to find a solution to the tire graves. After taking over, the Director General of the EPA pointed out that, “we will be able to deal with them all within a period of not more than a year,” AND YET NOTHING HAS BEEN DONE! Instead of burning tires, tires can be recycled into sub-layers for roads, playground flooring and fuel for the cement industry so please use your social media platform for good and share this post with your followers and tag people, celebrities and influencers who need to see and share this too as we MUST work together to make this go viral so everyone will be aware about this URGENT ISSUE — WE MUST STOP THESE TOXIC FIRES IMMEDIATELY, OUR PLANET DESERVES BETTER! #saveourplanet #stopthis #tirepollution #recycletires #wemustdobetter #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️GRAPHIC WARNING/SAD BREAKING NEWS, PLEASE SHARE AND LET’S HELP GREECE RIGHT NOW!⚠️ Tens of thousands of animals have died while thousands of tourists and residents have been evacuated from towns and villages as devastating wildfires continue to rage across Greece. This hard-hit country is sadly ill-equipped to battle over 150 fires burning, which have destroyed community after community, amid one of the worst heatwaves the country has seen in 40 years, burning forestland, destroying homes and businesses. In one late night video, ferries evacuated 1,153 people from the seaside village and beaches on Evia, after approaching flames cut off all other means of escape…while sadly the animals there did not escape. Since Greece doesn’t have enough resources to battle all these fires, firefighters are working 20+ hour shifts and sleeping whenever they can so 216 firefighters and 44 firefighting vehicles from Germany will be sent to the affected areas, but Greece needs more help too so we must use our social media platforms to spread awareness about this URGENT crisis by sharing this post with your followers and tagging people, celebrities, influencers and news media who need to see what’s happening here and share this post too and donate to our new @karmagawa fundraiser where 100% of funds raised will go towards to providing badly needed medical treatment, food, water and shelter for all the people and animals affected by these devastating fires. Join us in praying for ALL living creatures in these areas and let’s work together to save as many lives as possible! #helpgreece #savelives #prayforgreece #saveanimals #wildfires #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️SAD BREAKING NEWS, PLEASE SHARE AND LET’S HELP GREECE AND TURKEY!⚠️ We are calling on EVERYONE to help Greece and Turkey in their time of need because while these countries are being ravaged by wildfires, they are sadly ill-equipped to put them all out and save people/animals in time so the international community MUST HELP THEM RIGHT NOW! In the past 3 days, dozens of towns and villages in Greece have been evacuated as a protracted heatwave and strengthening winds fueled more than 150 wildfires and scientists say the destruction in just the last 72 hours exceeds 50% of the average area burnt in previous years! In Turkey, 8 people have died, tens of thousands have been evacuated and thousands of animals have perished and despite these wildfires burning 7x more land this year than any year in decades, this country has NO firefighting planes, so we must send them help! You can help by using your social media platform to spread awareness about this by sharing this post with your followers and tagging people, celebrities, influencers and news media who need to see and share this too and and donate to our new Karmagawa fundraiser where 100% of funds raised will go towards to providing medical treatment, food, water and shelter for all the people and animals affected by these devastating fires. We MUST all come to the aid of Greece and Turkey right now as this sadly record-breaking heatwave is forecast to continue for several days more so please share this post, donate and let’s all work together to help these hard-hit countries RIGHT NOW! #helpgreece #helpturkey #prayforturkey #prayforgreece #wildfire #letshelpeachother #karmagawa

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Karmagawa on August 05, 2021. May be an image of fire, outdoors and text that says 'PRAY FOR GREECE Greece is experiencing its worst heat wave in over 30 years, with temperatures set to hit 111°F on Monday There have been 100+ forest fires in 24 hours, with several villages evacuated. A minister said:"We are no longer talking about climate change Ûu” a climate threat. @5.36am'.

Photo by Karmagawa on August 05, 2021. May be an image of tree and text that says 'Help Turkey GLOBAL CALL We are in need of fire planes and assistance to put a stop to the forest fires raging across more than 60 locations on the beautiful turquoise coast and mountains.'.
